item.title: Running Dashboard in Minikube
item.description: To install and access Kubernetes Web UI (called Dashboard), you need to go through few simple steps. Make sure your Minikube cluster is started by running k8s-samples. If it is not running start it with minikube start. Create file dashboard-adminuser.yaml with content: apiVersion: v1 kind: ServiceAccount metadata: name: admin-user namespace: kubernetes-dashboard Create file dashboard-clusterrolebinding.yaml with content: apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1 kind: ClusterRoleBinding metadata: name: admin-user roleRef: apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io kind: ClusterRole name: cluster-admin subjects: - kind: ServiceAccount name: admin-user namespace: kubernetes-dashboard Apply both files by executing:
